markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Skittering Scuttle](/Feats.aspx?ID=4452) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 57 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Goblin Scuttle](/Feats.aspx?ID=4441)

</column>

---

You can scuttle farther and faster when maneuvering alongside allies. When you use Goblin Scuttle, you can [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=88) up to half your Speed instead of [Stepping](/Actions.aspx?ID=87).
name: Skittering Scuttle
